code: @Before public void start() throws Exception {     HttpHandler httpHandler = RouterFunctions.toHttpHandler(route(GET("/test"), request -> ServerResponse.ok().syncBody("It works!"))).     this.server = new ReactorHttpServer().     this.server.setHandler(httpHandler).     this.server.afterPropertiesSet().     this.server.start().     this.client = WebTestClient.bindToServer().baseUrl("http://localhost:" + this.server.getPort()).build(). }
